title: "Utrecht University: Quantum algorithms help computers understand language"
excerpt: "Tools from quantum mechanics can help computers to interpret ambiguous language. PhD candidate Adriana Duarte Correia showed that the application of quantum algorithms might allow computers to understand language better and faster."
